title: IIT Jammu Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for Technical Assistant Post
description: Indian Institute of Technology Jammu (IIT Jammu) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Technical Assistant Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the IIT Jammu Recruitment 2025 . Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before the last date of application. For more details, visit the official website...
